item.description:
Bring your poker skills to play in this free Texas Hold'm weekly tourni. Welcome to all skill levels and abilities. A fun event to get to know other poker players. And don't worry about losing early, there is a "Losers Game" that starts up after enough people are out to start a new game! Come early to meet everyone and relax.

We will be meeting at 6:30 pm in the bar area.

http://www.thebrewery...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the bar area, look for the Fun People
item.name: Free Poker Night
